text: Nicodemo Gentile (24 June 1969) is an Italian lawyer and TV personality. Born in Cirò (Calabria) on 1969, Gentile is part of the Perugia Lawyers and is a criminal lawyer. His career has always been committed to the families of murder victims and missing persons. He is known throughout Italy and is a member of the Penelope Association, founded in 2002. From 2020, he became president of this Association. From a few years he has always been on TV, guest on programs such as Chi l'ha visto? and Quarto grado and gives voice to the families of missing people.
